name: LayoutRuleOptions
shortdesc: Options for setting the layout rule on a page.

property.name: OFF
property.shortdesc: No layout rule on the page as it resizes.

property.name: SCALE
property.shortdesc: Scale objects on the page as it resizes.

property.name: RECENTER
property.shortdesc: Recenter objects on the page as it resizes.

property.name: GUIDE_BASED
property.shortdesc: Use guide slicing to resize objects on the page as it resizes.

property.name: OBJECT_BASED
property.shortdesc: Reposition and resize objects on the page as it resizes.

property.name: USE_MASTER
property.shortdesc: Use layout rule from the page's applied master page.

property.name: PRESERVE_EXISTING
property.shortdesc: Use existing layout rule setting on the page. Used for creating alternate layouts.
